movies._about: Rocky, a young man, seeks power and wealth in order to fulfil a promise to his dying mother. His quest takes him to Mumbai, where he gets involved with the notorious gold mafia.
_cast: Yash is an Indian actor who works in Kannada films. He is the recipient of three Filmfare Awards South. Yash began his career with appearances in several television series in the 2000s. He made his film debut in 2007 with Jambada Hudugi.

Srinidhi Ramesh Shetty is an Indian actress and the winner of the Miss Supranational 2016 pageant. She is the second Indian representative to have won this title. As an actress, Shetty has played the leading lady in the top-grossing Kannada action films K.G.F: Chapter 1 and K.G.F: Chapter 2.

movies._about: Based on the smuggling of red sander trees in Seshachalam forest, Andhra Pradesh, Pushpa tells the story of a lorry driver who is part of the illegal business.
_cast: Allu Arjun is an Indian actor known for his works mainly in Telugu cinema. One of the highest paid actors in India, Allu Arjun is also known for his dancing skills. He is a recipient of several awards including a National Film Award, six Filmfare Awards and three Nandi Awards.

Rashmika Mandanna is an Indian actress who works in Kannada, Tamil, Telugu and Hindi films. She is a recipient of four SIIMA Awards and a Filmfare South Critics Award for Best Actress. Rashmika made her acting debut with the Kannada film Kirik Party, and had her first Telugu film release in the romantic comedy Chalo.

movies._about: Protagonist of the story Arun Kumar is an aspiring filmmaker. In his pursuit of the craft, he collects various tales of psychopaths and serial killers. Constant rejections in his attempts and family constraints force him to abandon his dream and take up the job of a Police officer.
_cast: Vishal Kudawla, known professionally as Vishnu Vishal, is an Indian actor and producer who appears in Tamil film industry. After a brief career in cricket, he started his acting career in the year 2009 playing the lead role in the sports film Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu, winning acclaim for his portrayal.

Amala Paul is an Indian actress and producer who predominantly appears in Tamil, Malayalam and Telugu films. She made her acting debut in the Malayalam film Neelathamara. She won the Tamil Nadu State Film Award for Best Actress for playing the title role in Mynaa.

movies._about: Vada Chennai is the story of a fisherman from North Chennai, who does not even realize when he falls prey to the trap set by a mafia gang, and what happens to him later.
_cast: Venkatesh Prabhu Kasthuri Raja, known professionally as Dhanush, is an Indian actor, producer, director, lyricist and playback singer who primarily works in Tamil cinema.

Aishwarya Rajesh is an Indian actress who works predominantly in Tamil films along with Malayalam and Telugu films. Aishwarya is a recipient of four South Indian International Movie Awards, one Filmfare Award South and one Tamil Nadu State Film Award.

movies._about: Brace yourself for an extraordinary tale of rebellion filled with power-packed action.
_cast: Born as Prabhas Raju Uppalapati, Prabhas is a popular Indian actor who appears in Telugu cinema. He is the nephew of the veteran actor of the Telugu film industry, Uppalapati Krishnam Raju.

One of the most talented and versatile artists in the Indian film industry, Shruti Haasan is an established actress, singer and music composer who predominantly works in the South Indian film industry. She has worked in films across Tamil, Telugu and Hindi languages. The gorgeous actress who made her debut on the silver screen with Hey Ram in 2000 has appeared in several commercially and critically successful films like 7aum Arivu (2011), Yevadu (2014), Puli (2015) and Welcome Back (2015) and along the way picked up several awards including three Filmfare Awards, SIIMA Award, CineMAA Award and Asiavision Award. Apart from acting, Shruti takes a keen interest in music and has sung several songs in her movies while also producing her own music albums.

movies._about: I is a 2015 Indian Tamil-language romantic action thriller film written and directed by S. Shankar. Produced and distributed by V. Ravichandran under his production company, Aascar Films, the film features Vikram, Amy Jackson and Suresh Gopi in lead roles while Santhanam, Upen Patel, Ojas Rajani. Lingesan(Vikram), a successful model, falls in love with his co-model Diya and the two decide to marry.
_cast: Kennedy John Victor, better known by his stage name Vikram or Chiyaan Vikram, is an Indian actor who predominantly works in Tamil cinema.
Amy Louise Jackson is an English actress and model known for her work in Indian films, predominantly in Tamil films, along with a few Hindi, Telugu, English and Kannada films.

movies._about: Jigarthanda DoubleX is a 2023 Indian Tamil-language action drama film written and directed by Karthik Subbaraj and jointly produced by him, Kaarthekeyen Santhanam, S. Kathiresan and Alankar Pandian under Stone Bench Films, Five Star Creations and Invenio Origin. The film is a spiritual successor and prequel to Jigarthanda (2014) and stars Raghava Lawrence, S. J. Suryah and Nimisha Sajayan. A notorious gangster(Raghava) is incited to transform into a film hero and opts for a filmmaker and their project descends into a scenario they had never anticipated.
_cast: Award-winning choreographer Raghavendra Lawrence took to acting in 1999 with the Telugu dance-action film Speed Dancer. Following his acting debut, he went on to be a part of various movies such as Thendral, Kanchana, Kanchana 2, and Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva.

Nimisha Sajayan is an Indian film actress active in the Malayalam film industry. Her 2017 acting debut includes the comedy film Thondimuthalum Driksakshiyum, under the direction of Dileesh Pothan, starring Fahadh Faasil in the lead role.

movies._about: Guntur Kaaram is a Telugu movie starring Mahesh Babu, Meenakshi Chaudhary, and Shree Leela. It is written and directed by Trivikram Srinivas.
_cast: Born on 9th August 1975, as Mahesh Ghattamaneni, Mahesh Babu is a popular Indian actor who works in the Telugu film industry.

Sree Leela is an actress who predominantly works in the Kannada film industry. She made her debut through Kiss (2019), where she played the lead role opposite Viraat. This was followed by Bharaate (2019), where she appears alongside the star Srii Murali.

movies._about: Jayee Rajguru, the first martyr of our freedom struggle against the British, was born in Puri in 1739 to a Brahmin family and his father was the royal priest of the King of Khordha. After his father's demise, Jayee took over the reins but the king was a minor, so all the responsibilities of the kingdom fell on him.
_cast: Born on 9th August 1975, as Mahesh Ghattamaneni, Mahesh Babu is a popular Indian actor who works in the Telugu film industry.
Pooja Hegde is an Indian actress and model, who finished as the second runner-up at the Miss Universe India competition in 2010.

movies._about: The young scion of a powerful family with a long legacy of violence decides to put an end to the bloodshed - a journey that will also take him down a path of self-discovery.
_cast: Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao Jr, better known by his screen name, Jr. NTR is one of the most popular Indian actors and a playback singer who works mainly in the Telugu film industry. Jr. NTR made his foray in acting at a very young, he first appeared in the National Award winning film, Ramayanam as a child artist in 1996.
Pooja Hegde is an Indian actress and model, who finished as the second runner-up at the Miss Universe India competition in 2010.

movies._about: Theri is a thriller starring Vijay in the role of a policeman who takes revenge on the villain after his family is attacked.Theri is a 2016 Indian Tamil-language action thriller film directed by Atlee and produced by Kalaipuli S. Thanu under the banner V Creations. Inspired from Mani Ratnam's film Chatriyan, the film stars Vijay, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Amy Jackson, Nainika, Radhika Sarathkumar, Rajendran and Mahendran
_cast: Widely regarded as the most popular Tamil actor of his generation, Joseph Vijay Chandrasekhar, better known as Vijay, is well-beloved by his legions of fans across India and around the world. The South Indian star is endearingly referred to by his admirers as `Ilayathalapathy` (or simply, `Thalapathy`), and his box office clout is often at par with none other than Rajinikanth, with many regarding him as the heir apparent to the Kollywood titan.Some of Vijay`s most iconic roles over the years have come in films like Kadhalukku Mariyadhai (1997), Thulladha Manamum Thullum (1999), Ghilli (2004), Pokkiri (2007) and Thuppakki (2012); while the blockbuster Mersal (2017) and the action thriller Sarkar (2018) are among his more recent acting credits.

Samantha is an actress who predominantly works in the Kannada film industry. She made her debut through Kiss (2019), where she played the lead role opposite Viraat. This was followed by Bharaate (2019), where she appears alongside the star Srii Murali.

movies._about: Allu Arjun plays a man from a typical middle-class family who is frustrated from having to deal with typical family issues. Things change when he gets the opportunity to lead his dream life with another family.
_cast: Allu Arjun is an Indian actor who predominantly works in the Telugu film industry. Born in a family associated with the South Indian cinema, his uncle is none other than the popular actor Chiranjeevi, one of the most successful actors of Telugu cinema.
Pooja Hegde is an Indian actress and model, who finished as the second runner-up at the Miss Universe India competition in 2010.

movies._about: A 25-year-old man, Govind, falls in love with Geetha and considers her to be his lady love. However, Geetha doesn`t reciprocate his love as he comes across as a womaniser. Will he be able to impress her?
_cast: Vijay was born to Devarakonda Gowardhan Rao and Devarakonda Madhavi in Hyderabad. He has a younger brother Anand, and both his parents hail from the Mahabubnagar district of Telangana. Vijay`s mother is the proprietor of Speak Easy in Hyderabad and his father is a TV director. As a child, Vijay spent most of his growing years away from his family as he completed his schooling from Sathya Sai Higher Secondary School, which is a boarding school in Aranthapur district, Andhra Pradesh. Vijay later credited the peaceful and calm environment of his school, which helped him hone his acting skills. When in school, the actor had no access to TV and mobile phones, and so he spent most of his time reading newspapers, books, and playing sports.

Born to M. A. Mandanna and Suman Mandanna on 5th of April, 1996 in Virajpet, Karnataka, Rashmika completed her schooling from Coorg Public School. She then went on to attend Mysore Institute of Commerce & Arts to pursue an undergraduate course, following which she moved to Bengaluru to pursue her bachelor`s degree from M. S. Ramaiah College of Arts, Science & Commerce, with her major subjects being journalism, English literature, and psychology. While modeling and acting in movies, Rashmika managed her final year studies in 2016.

movies._about: Rahul sets out to immerse his late grandfather`s ashes at Rameshwaram. However, upon helping a runaway bride Meena, he has to face the wrath of her criminal family.
_cast: Born on the 2nd of November, 1965 in New Delhi, Khan spent the first five years of his life with his maternal grandfather in Mangalore. He then moved back to New Delhi, where his family lived in rented apartments. Khan then joined St. Colombia`s School in New Delhi, where he excelled in both studies and sports such as football and hockey. He was also the recipient of his school`s highest award, the Sword of Honor.

Born on 5th January 1986, Deepika Padukone is the daughter of Ujjala Padukone and former international badminton player Prakash Padukone, A year after Deepika`s birth, she and her family moved to Bangalore, India. She studied at Sophia High School and completed her junior college from Mount Carmel College. Deepika Padukone first appeared in an advertising campaign at the age of eight.

movies._about: In the chaos of our constantly changing fast life, our destiny intersects our paths with paths of different kinds of people everyday. Not all these people we meet are meant to stay, but the fortunate ones somehow do!
_cast: Vaibhav Tatwawadi is a Marathi film actor, who made his debut with the film Kurukshetra in 2013. He was a part of television series such as Amar Prem (2013) and Tuza Maza Jamena (2013). Some of his other performances can be seen in Coffee Ani Barach Kahi (2015) and Shortcut (2015). He also played an integral role in the hit film Bajirao Mastani (2015) and in Mr. and Mrs. Sadachari (2016).

Pooja Sawant is an actress known for her work in Marathi cinema and television. Her appearances in multiple dance reality shows such as Boogie Woogie, Eka Peksha Ek Jodich Mamla and Wajale ki Bara were essential in cementing her path to showbiz. She made her debut in the 2010 Marathi film Kshanbhar Vishranti, followed by Zhakaas (2011) and Satrangi Re (2012). Pooja`s films like Poshter Boyz (2014), Sata Lota Pan Sagla Khota (2015) and Nilkanth Master (2015) were well received at the box-office.

movies._about: Bheeshma (Single Forever) is written and directed by Venky Kudumula. Produced by Suryadevara Naga Vamsi under Sithara entertainments, Bheeshma stars Nithiin and Rashmika Mandanna in the lead roles. Music Composed By Devi Sri Prasad Bheeshma is going to release on this Christmas 2019. Other Cast of the movie is yet to be announced.
_cast: Nithin Kumar Reddy (born 30 March 1983), known professionally as Nithiin, is an Indian actor and producer who primarily works in Telugu films. Nithiin made his acting debut with the romantic action film Jayam (2002), for which he received Filmfare Award for Best Male Debut – South and CineMAA Awards Best Male Debut.

Born to M. A. Mandanna and Suman Mandanna on 5th of April, 1996 in Virajpet, Karnataka, Rashmika completed her schooling from Coorg Public School. She then went on to attend Mysore Institute of Commerce & Arts to pursue an undergraduate course, following which she moved to Bengaluru to pursue her bachelor`s degree from M. S. Ramaiah College of Arts, Science & Commerce, with her major subjects being journalism, English literature, and psychology. While modeling and acting in movies, Rashmika managed her final year studies in 2016.

movies._about: While on a trip to India for his brother's wedding, NRI Varun meets village belle Bhanu, and the two develop an instant connection. However, the vast difference between their worlds drives a wedge between the couple soon after. Will their love prevail over their differences?
_cast: An Indian actor, Varun Tej is known for work in Telugu cinema. The actor who comes from an influential family in the Telugu film industry is the son of yesteryear legendary actor Nagendra Babu and the nephew of superstar actors Chiranjeevi and Pawan Kalyan. After making his debut on the silver screen as a child artist with Hands Up! (2000), Varun`s maiden film as the lead actor was Mukunda (2014), a Telugu drama written and directed by Srikanth Addala.

Best remembered for her portrayal of Malar in the 2015 coming-of-age musical-romantic comedy Premam, Sai Pallavi in an Indian film actress. Apart from being an actor, Sai is also a trained dancer and has appeared on dance reality shows such as Ungalil Yaar Adutha Prabhu Deva and Dhee Ultimate Dance Show (D4). Although her first screen presence was an uncredited role in the Kangana Ranaut-starrer Malayalam romantic thriller Dhaam Dhoom in 2008.

movies._about: A happy-go-lucky Chitti Babu, who has a partial hearing disability, lives in a village called Rangasthalam and is unaffected by the perpetual chaos created in the village by its dreaded president, Garu. However, when his elder brother Kumar Babu returns home from Dubai and finds out that not much had changed around him, he decides to take on Garu.
_cast: Ram Charan is an Indian actor, producer and an entrepreneur who predominantly works in the Telugu film industry. Ram Charan who made his acting debut with Chirutha in 2007 has been part of several highly acclaimed movies like The Fighter, Magadheera, Racha, and Naayak. Apart from being an actor, Ram Charan also turned producer for his father, Chiranjeevi`s 150th film and produced the film under his own production house named Konidela Production Company.

Samantha Ruth Prabhu is a South Indian actress and model, who primarily acts in the Tamil and Telugu film industries. She has won numerous awards for her acting and is one of the highest paid and sought-after actresses in the industry. Samantha made her debut in 2010, with the Telugu film Ye Maaya Chesave, which won her plaudits from fans and critics alike.

movies._about: The life of a young and happy couple gets turned upside down when the guy receives a call from an unknown woman claiming to be in danger. A new take on the classic love triangle, Triple Seat brings you a light-hearted story about a wireless love with a cross connection.
_cast: Ankush Chaudhari is an Indian film and TV actor who is known for his work in Marathi film industry. The actor rose to fame with a brilliant performance in the Soona Yeti Ghara (1995). The film paved way for Ankush get more offers in Marathi films and TV series`. Apart from acting, Ankush has also worked as an assistant director in several films and he best known as DSP, which was a screen name in the 2013 blockbuster film, Duniyadari.

Shivani Surve is an Indian actress popularly known for Marathi TV Serials. She made her debut in Marathi Serial Devyani and later worked in Hindi shows like Phulwa, Navya and Agle Janam Mohe Bitiya Hi Kijo. She played a lead role in Bhojpuri film Ganga Mili Sagar Se. She played an important role in the TV serial Anamika which aired on Sony TV. Her movie Ghantaa released in January 2016. In 2019, her acting credits include the Marathi film Triple seat, directed by Sanket prakash pavse.

movies._about: Padi Padi Leche Manasu (A heart that keeps rising and falling) is a 2018 Indian Telugu-language romantic drama film[1] written and directed by Hanu Raghavapudi. The film stars Sharwanand and Sai Pallavi while Priya Raman, Sampath Raj, Kalyani Natarajan, Murali Sharma, Priyadarshi, and Sunil play supporting roles.
_cast: Sharwanand Myneni was born in Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh to Myneni Vasundhara Devi and Myneni Ratnagiri Vara Prasad Rao, and brought up in Hyderabad, Telangana.[3] He did his schooling from The Hyderabad Public School, Begumpet, where he was classmates with Ram Charan and Rana Daggubati.[4] He then completed his B.Com from Wesley Degree College, Secunderabad.[4] During his college days, Sharwanand was selected as The Hindu's Best New Face. At the age of 17, Sharwanand attended Kishore Namit Kapoor Acting Institute in Mumbai.

Best remembered for her portrayal of Malar in the 2015 coming-of-age musical-romantic comedy Premam, Sai Pallavi in an Indian film actress. Apart from being an actor, Sai is also a trained dancer and has appeared on dance reality shows such as Ungalil Yaar Adutha Prabhu Deva and Dhee Ultimate Dance Show (D4). Although her first screen presence was an uncredited role in the Kangana Ranaut-starrer Malayalam romantic thriller Dhaam Dhoom in 2008.

movies._about: Set in a village named Rudravanam in 1990`s and inspired by ancient Indian superstitions, Virupaksha tells the story of Surya who discovers some mystical paranormal activities occurring in the village. Can he save the village?
_cast: Sai Dharam Tej is an Indian film actor who works primarily in the Telugu film industry. He made his acting debut with Pilla Nuvvu Leni Jeevitham (2014), which earned him a SIIMA Award for Best Debut Actor that year. Since then, he has appeared in a slew of commercially successful entertainers like Subramanyam for Sale (2015), Supreme (2016) and Tikka (2016). The action film Winner, the multi-starrer project Nakshatram and Jawaan are some of the actor`s projects in 2017.

Samyuktha Menon first ventured into the world of cinema in 2016, with the Mollywood comedy Popcorn. Though the film failed to make a major impact at the box office, Samyuktha`s confident performance despite being a debutante was well-received. Notable among the actress` most recent works is the comedy film Theevandi (2018), where she starred alongside Tovino Thomas, Lilli (2018) and Ezhumin (2018). Her 2019 releases include July Kaatril, Sundaram, Oru Yamandan Prema Kadha, Uyare, Kalki, Edakkad Battalion 06 and Under World.

movies._about: Almost half a century ago, a remote village in the middle of a tropical rainforest starts witnessing a series of unexplainable events which they attribute to the supernatural. This coincides with the arrival of an eccentric police officer, Vikrant Rona. A mysterious game unfolds where everyone in the village is a potential victim and everyone is a suspect.
_cast: Born in Shimoga district, Karnataka, Sudeep is the son of Sanjeev Manjappa and Saroja. The actor earned his Bachelor`s degree in Industrial and Production engineering from Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering in Bangalore. Being a shy person from childhood, the actor went to Roshan Taneja School of Acting, Mumbai to overcome his shyness and hone his acting skills.

Born in Bahrain, to a Sri Lankan father, Elroy Fernandez and Malaysian mother, Kim, Jacqueline is the youngest of four children with one elder sister and two elder brothers. Jacqueline did her schooling from Bahrain and then went to the University of Sydney from where she graduated in Mass Communication. After graduating she began working as a television reporter in Sri Lanka but simultaneously continued modeling and in 2006 she was crowned the Miss Sri Lanka Universe.

movies._about: A TV channel crew goes to a deserted bungalow by the beach to shoot a horror show. However, the house is really haunted by 6 ghosts who are out for revenge. What happens next?
_cast: Award-winning choreographer Raghavendra Lawrence took to acting in 1999 with the Telugu dance-action film Speed Dancer. Following his acting debut, he went on to be a part of various movies such as Thendral, Kanchana, Kanchana 2, and Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva. While pursuing his acting career, he simultaneously started directing, debuting with the 2004 Telugu movie starring Akkineni Nagarjuna and Jyothika titled Mass, which went on to become a blockbuster hit.

Taapsee Pannu is an Indian model and a popular actress who mainly works in the South Indian film industry. She has appeared in movies across different languages including Tamil, Telugu, Hindi and Malayalam and has enjoyed great success. A software engineering graduate, Taapsee began her career as a model and won several titles such as Pantaloons Femina Fresh Face and Safi Femina Miss Beautiful Skin in 2008.

movies._about: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.
_cast: Admired universally for his charismatic screen presence, Shivaji Rao Gaekwad, better known by his screen name Rajinikanth, is an iconic actor who primarily works in the Tamil film industry. Endearingly referred to as `Thalaiva` by his fans, Rajinikanth`s larger-than-life aura is without parallels, and has even redefined the limits of superstardom and earned him a demigod status among many of his ardent admirers.

Diana Mariam Kurian, famously known by her stage name, Nayanthara, is an Indian actress who is primarily known for her work in Tamil, Malayalam and Telugu cinema. Hailed as the `Lady Superstar` of South Indian cinema, she made her acting debut in 2003 with the Malayalam movie Manassinakkare, and her Kollywood debut with Ayya (2005).
